## Definition of Done
- [ ] The change is thoroughly documented.
- [ ] The CI passes (`R CMD check`, linter, unit tests, spelling).
- [ ] Any generated files have been updated (e.g. `.Rd` files with `roxygen2::roxygenise()`)
